I recently lost this belt, but when I had it, I loved it. It’s probably one of my favorite belts. Had a little thing in the back where you could extend it and make it smaller or larger and it was small and dainty. I would definitely order another one of these and in multiple colors! Definitely pretty durable and doesn’t seem cheaply made. Versatile and can be dressed up or dressed down. The functionality served its purpose and was stretchable. Overall great purchase!

The perfect belt in my opinion. I am a plus size woman who typically wears a size 18 in pants and I can never find a belt that fits! Straight sized belts are too small, but plus size belts can be too large and I often find myself puncturing an additional hole in them. These belts eliminate that need and allow you to adjust to your perfect size. They are small enough that they don't bother me when I sit down at work all day, and the gold clasp is so cute! Love wearing these as a belt with jeans, as a cinch on a dress, or even under a sweater and using the belt as a way to crop my sweaters. I recommend these to everyone!
